entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
